name: Sengoku Hime: Senran ni Mau Otometachi
overview: After a big war, various feudal lords gain power. Hojo, Uesugi, Imagawa, Mouri, Otomo, Oda, Shimazu, Satake, Date, Takeda and so on.... They fight each other and sometimes ally with others to expand territory for one and only goal.... Every feudal lord's ultimate goal is to conquer and unite the country....
